question: The GoI has launched the “Sameer App” to deal with which of the following?
option1: To measure AQI and to report environmentally polluting activities
option2: To facilitate a platform for NGOs and Civil Societies to interact
option3: To monitor all the schemes for Adolescent Girls in the country
option4: To track number of cancer patients in the country
answer: To measure AQI and to report environmentally polluting activities
explanation: Sameer is an APP that provides hourly updates on the National Air Quality Index (AQI) published by CPCB. Air Quality Index is a tool for effective communication of air quality in a single number, nomenclature and colour.
